text: jo tumhaare maamale mein prateeksha karate hai, yadi allaah kee or se tumhaaree vijay huee to kahate hai, "kya ham tumhaar saath na the?" aur yadi vidharmiyon ke haath kuchh laga to kahate hai, "kya hamane tumhen gher nahin liya tha aur eemaanavaalon se bachaaya nahin?" atah allaah qiyaamat ke din tumhaare beech faisala kar dega, aur allaah vidharmiyon ko eemaanavaalon ke muqaabale mein koee raah nahin dega
